'''Sareh's Note''' is a [[Quest Item]] obtained during the {{Quest|Meow... Meow meow? Meow! Meow.}} There are three versions: [[Meow... Meow meow? Meow! Meow.#Lale Version|Lale's]], [[Meow... Meow meow? Meow! Meow.#Nargis Version|Nargis's]], and [[Meow... Meow meow? Meow! Meow.#Rozan Version|Rozan's]].
